content:
model{
  for(k in 1:180){
     logy[k] <- log(y[k])
     logy[k] ~ dnorm(m[k],tau)
     m[k] <- mu + b[ID[k]]
   }
  for(i in 1:30){ b[i] ~ dnorm(0,taub) }
  sigma ~ dunif(0,100)
  tau <- 1/(sigma*sigma)
  sigmab ~ dunif(0,100) 
  taub <- 1/(sigmab*sigmab)
  mu ~ dnorm(0,0.001)
  rho <- tau/(taub+tau)
  bf ~ dnorm(0,taub)
  ef ~ dnorm(0,tau)
  muf <- mu + bf
  logyf <- muf + ef
   # Predictive density
  yf <- exp(logyf)
   # 90th and 10th percentiles for muf
  U <- mu + 1.28*sqrt(1/taub)
  L <- mu - 1.28*sqrt(1/taub)
}
